channel.title: Mining with all rocks? would be nice. :3
channel.description:
Is there anyway to add mining to my server and have it work with all the rocks already on the server? i dont want to have to add mining and have to add rocks as global objects..
P.S. HAPPY NEW YEAR!

item.title: Mining with all rocks? would be nice. :3
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

i got mine working with left-click ;), but i’m just saying…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 11:11:03 PM[/size][hr]search for this

case 132:

and somewhere in that crazy case put this in…

if (objectID == 2096) { if(actionTimer == 0) { if(playerLevel[14] >= 30) { if(hasPick()) { actionTimer = 20; addItem(453, 1); addSkillXP(50, 14); setAnimation(625); } else { sendMessage("You need a pickaxe to mine this rock."); } } else { sendMessage("You need 30 mining to mine this rock."); } }

this is for coal.

item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

it would be easier down the road if you made a boolean for the pickaxes

public boolean hasPick() { if(playerHasItem2(1275) || playerHasItem2(1271) || playerHasItem2(1273) || playerHasItem2(1269) || playerHasItem2(1267) || playerHasItem2(1265)) { return true; } return false; }

then you would say it like this…

case 2108: if(hasPick()) {

item.source: Mining with all rocks? would be nice. :3

item.title: Mining with all rocks? would be nice. :3
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

case 2108: if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || HasItemAmount(1265, 1)) { if (actionTimer == 0) { if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) { actionAmount++; addItem(434, 1); actionTimer = 28; PickAxeOwns(); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[14]), 14); sendMessage("You swing at the rock, and you get some ore!"); } else { sendMessage("You need at least one mining, to mine this rock!"); } else { sendMessage("You do not have a pic axe with you!"); } break;

Try that.

PS:

When you tried, compiling. did you get any errors?

Read full topic

item.description:
@jmaldon wrote:

alright…well i did that but wen i go to the correct rock nothing hapens when i attempt to mine it…or prospect it.

heres the code…plz take a look…

case 2108: if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || HasItemAmount(1265, 1)){ if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) { if (actionTimer == 0) { actionAmount++; addItem(434, 1); actionTimer = 28; PickAxeOwns(); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[14]), 14); sendMessage("you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!");} else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) { sendMessage("you need at least 1 Mining to mine Clay!"); }}} break;
